gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This dataset is an evaluation of how vegetation distribution, carbon stocks and turnover, and water and energy exchange are related to environmental variation spanned by the network of the International Geosphere–Biosphere Program (IGBP) high latitude transects.

gmd:deliveryPoint.gco:CharacterString: 216 Irving I Building University of Alaska Fairbanks
